tool_description: Retrieves data about an important day in history.
name: Today in History
title: Today in History

api_list.name: Get Event
api_list.description: Gets a detailed summary of an event.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://today-in-history.p.rapidapi.com/thisday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "today-in-history.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://today-in-history.p.rapidapi.com/thisday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "today-in-history.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
